title: i can't redeem dreadknight garen from the promo code!
body:
I have tried to redeem the garen skin through twitter but when i redeem it "Pay now" button it says that there was a problem fulfilling my store items. I tried a couple days back but seems that it does not work. It would be very nice if you could help me. 

Thank you.

replies.body: i have the same problem can anybody help please ?
No worries! I've got Garen and the Dreadknight added onto your account for ya ^_^
I have the same issue occurring, I got the EU code for my EUW account and have the same error message as OP, would appreciate the help.
Hello! I have the same problem when I try to do this.I followed the page on twitter and followed every step.It still doesn't work.
i can t get the garen skin too from redeem it says that was a problem
I'm also having the same problem! Please fix!
